summary: This bill, the Safety from Aerial Technology Act (SAT Act), amends Title 49 of the United States Code to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to allow the use of unmanned aircraft systems and satellites for inspecting the rights-of-way of certain pipeline facilities. The bill aims to facilitate the use of aerial technology for assessing surface conditions along pipeline routes, while clarifying that such use must comply with existing regulations regarding unmanned aircraft systems and satellite operation.
